code: import appConfig from'./appConfig.json';var profile_photo=function profile_photo(){if(sessionStorage.session){var id=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('login_data')).user_id;return id;}else{var _id="unknown";return _id;}};var logout=function logout(){if(sessionStorage.session){var xhr=new XMLHttpRequest();xhr.open('POST',appConfig.origin+"backend_api/logout");xhr.onreadystatechange=function(){if(xhr.readyState===4&&xhr.status===200){console.log("successfully Logged Out");delete sessionStorage.session;}};xhr.setRequestHeader('session',JSON.stringify(sessionStorage.session));xhr.send();}};export{profile_photo,logout};
